<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Restorative Moment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1885)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 385 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Renewal](/Lessons.aspx?ID=25)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your patron weaves the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a day's passage. The target decreases the values of any [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) conditions it has by 1 and can immediately attempt one saving throw against each affliction it has with a stage length of 1 day or less. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.
name: Restorative Moment
